title: For Now, Forever
description: White Periwinkle: Pleasures of MemoryPremed student Anna Whitfield simply had no time for men, much less marriage! But Daniel MacGregor was as stubborn as a mule when it came to getting what he wanted. He was determined to build his own dynastyâ€”and lovely Anna was vital to his plans. Together they created moments to treasure...a love to remember now and forever.
author: Nora Roberts
